sentences.en: A tension member may fail by plastic yielding.
sentences.cn: 拉伸元件可能由于塑性屈伏而破坏.

sentences.en: Far and wide lay a ruined country, yielding nothing but desolation.
sentences.cn: 残破的农村四面伸展;除了荒凉之外再也生产不出什么.

sentences.en: Far and wide lay a ruined coutry, yielding nothing but desolation.
sentences.cn: 残破的乡村平躺在广远的土地上, 并不生产什么,只是一片荒凉.

sentences.en: Increasingly, farm land is yielding to property development.
sentences.cn: 地产的发展逐渐占据了农田.

sentences.en: It is made of a yielding rubber or similar springing material.
sentences.cn: 它是由一种柔软的橡皮或类似的弹性材料做成的.

sentences.en: Oil - yielding organic matter is contained in the shales.
sentences.cn: 在这些页岩里有产油的有机物质.

sentences.en: Potentially " high - yielding " clones are likely to be the material which first come to hand.
sentences.cn: 有 “ 高产 ” 可能的无性系大概首先是随手可得的材料.

sentences.en: She reclined lazily on soft yielding cushions.
sentences.cn: 她懒洋洋的靠在柔软的靠垫上。

sentences.en: The long cruel winter came to an end at last, yielding to a gentle warm spring.
sentences.cn: 漫长的严冬终于结束, 随之而来的是温暖的春天.

sentences.en: The universe is slowly yielding up its secrets to scientists.
sentences.cn: 宇宙慢慢地向科学家展现了自己的秘密.

sentences.en: the yielding softness of the bed
There were the crowds, hurrying with the same buzz and energy - yielding enthusiasm.
sentences.cn: 路上到处是嘈杂的人流, 他们急急走着,步履中照旧透出充沛的精力和热情.

sentences.en: Wherever his hands moved it was all as yielding as water.
sentences.cn: 他的手摸着哪儿,都像水一样顺从.

sentences.en: Yerkshire people are as yielding to persuation as they are stubborn against compulsion.
sentences.cn: 约克郡人的服软正如他们不肯吃硬的倔强脾气一样.

sentences.en: Yielding can properly be termed failure.
sentences.cn: 可以恰当地把屈服叫做失败.

sentences.en: Yielding himself to his feelings of worthlessness, he tried to kill himself.
sentences.cn: 他总是觉得自己一无是处, 便企图自杀.

words.tran_cn: 提供产品的人；让步者，屈服者
生产的；屈从的；易弯曲的；柔顺的

phrases.tran_cn: 弹性支承；可缩性支座/支架

trans.tran_cn: 柔软的，易弯曲的，顺从的，服从的
trans.tran_en: a surface that is yielding is soft and will move or bend when you press it
